sentence.Network_en: Fiers promised to testify fully and truthfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 菲耶尔承诺所作证词将毫无保留且句句属实。

sentence.Network_en: I answered all their questions truthfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 我如实地回答了他们的所有问题。

sentence.Network_en: He answered frankly and truthfully all my questions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坦率而真诚地回答了我的所有问题.

entry.def: If a person or their comments are truthful, they are honest and do not tell any lies.

example.ex: Most religions teach you to be truthful…
example.tran: 大部分宗教都教导人要诚实。

example.ex: We've all learnt to be fairly truthful about our personal lives...
example.tran: 我们都学会了要非常坦诚地对待自己的个人生活。

sentences.sentence: "I told him truthfully that I had just returned from my vacation"
"he answered the question as truthfully as he could"

auth_sentence.content: No religion can truthfully say the same about itself.
auth_sentence.res_content: No religion can truthfully say the same about itself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No religion can truthfully say the same about itself.

auth_sentence.content: Try to truthfully say or think I do not exist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Try to truthfully say or think I do not exist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Try to truthfully say or think I do not exist.

auth_sentence.content: My mother answered truthfully that she did not.
auth_sentence.res_content: My mother answered truthfully that she did not.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My mother answered truthfully that she did not.

sentences.en: She looked her father straight in the eye and answered his question truthfully.
sentences.cn: 她直视着父亲的眼睛，诚实地回答了他的问题。
